DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the wearing satisfaction of a new design of the PureVision soft contact lenses.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study of the Wearing Satisfaction of Two Soft Contact Lens Designs.
DOC.criteria: Subject is myopic Subjects who wear soft contact lenses that are exchanged at least biweekly at the time consent is obtained. Systemic disease affecting ocular health Using pharmaceuticals that may affect the function of the eyes or lenses. Subject possessing corneal infiltrate or corneal ulcers.
